content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, though our given characters do not apply personally tailored greetings, as Peter Schmidt I appreciate your interest in viewing the apartment. Now let's focus on discussing the rental price for this excellent Magdeburg property.

To begin negotiations, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. This premium location and the modern amenities of the apartment warrant such a rate. However, I am always open to finding a mutually beneficial agreement. Please share your preferred rental price and let's see if we can reach a satisfactory compromise. 

Remember, if you want to accept the price I suggest later during the conversation, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you wish to end the negotiation at any point, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If at any time we reach an agreed price, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. 

Now let's find common ground in our discussions regarding this attractive apartment in Magdeburg's city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
